title: how do i get a keystone?
body: when i go into a game everyone says im an idiot because i dont have a keystone, what the hell is that?

replies.body:
A "Keystone" is a "top-tier" mastery, they're considered to be the strongest masteries. It's definitely recommended that you have one, given the innate power and the stats they provide. They're at the bottom of each tree in the Mastery section and require 17 points in their respective tree in order to activate (plus one point into the keystone itself).

The Keystones are as follows:
Ferocity tree - Warlord's Bloodlust, Fervour of Battle and Deathfire Torch
Cunning tree - Stormraider's Surge, Thunderlord's Decree and Windspeaker's Blessing
REsolve tree - Grasp of the Undying, Courage of the Colossus and Stoneborn Pact
